thread.title: Miley Cyrus Throws Weed-Themed Joint Birthday Bash For Noah Cyrus And Liam Hemsworth! Look!
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus Throws Weed-Themed Joint Birthday Bash For Noah Cyrus And Liam Hemsworth! Look!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Miley Cyrus Throws Weed-Themed Joint Birthday Bash For Noah Cyrus And Liam Hemsworth! Look!
text:
1/15/2017 5:28 PM ET | Filed under: Drugs • Love Line • Miley Cyrus • Party Poppin' • Snoop Dogg • Liam Hemsworth • Ashley Greene • Family • Alcohol • A • Noah Cyrus • Instagram • Heartwarming 
There's only one thing for Miley Cyrus to do when Liam Hemsworth and Noah Cyrus have birthdays less than a week apart… fire up a joint party! 
…And even better for Miley, you can fire up a weed theme for that party, like she did on Friday night!! 
Related: Miley Texts Pictures Of Herself Peeing! 
As you can see a little bit (above), Miley held a shindig for Noah and Liam this weekend, complete with some special weed goodie bags from Snoop Dogg 's marijuana-focused company Merry Jane , and a WHOLE lot more highlights (below)!!! 
Ashley Greene was among the partygoers for the event, and it looks like things got a little wacky later in the evening, thanks to a gigantic pizza, massive gold chains, and lots and lots and lots of… weed?? 
Ch-ch-check out the Instagram highlights HERE!!
